quote: I have no interest in writing confessions, in deliberately baring myself to my readers. I prefer to remain behind a screen.

I have no interest in trying to manipulate people's emotions or opinions.

I can't wait until I have my children. I love the idea that they don't have to do something that they have no interest in, that they can do something completely opposite if they want to.

What I think is remarkable about my mum and dad is they had no interest in films, really. None.

I have no maternal instinct whatsoever. Motherhood holds no interest for me.

I have no interest in directing. I've no talent for it.

I have a hard enough time speaking for myself - I don't pretend I can be a spokesman for anybody. I have no interest in playing that role.

I had no interest in music. But now, music means everything to me. I have no words to explain how beautiful music is. It is where you can create everything, like beautiful songs to sad songs to almost anything.

I have no interest in making a work that doesn't elicit a feeling.

I've no interest in fashion, shoes, handbags, or sweaty shopping.

I had no interest in fashion when I was younger. I was such a tomboy.

I have no interest in going to Egypt and seeing the pyramids. I'm just not that kind of dude.
